Name: TA 1367 Content filter rules ui tests

Tests.Name: Test 1: Create filter rule with default values

Steps.Name: Step: Create a filter rule with name `default_filter_rule` and default values
Step: User can create a filter rule with text name
Step: User cannot create a filter rule with empty name

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is too short

Failed validating 'minLength' in schema['properties']['name']:
    {'description': 'Name of entity shown in UI',
     'minLength': 1,
     'title': 'Name',
     'type': 'string'}

On instance['name']:
    ''"

Steps.Name: Step: User cannot create a filter rule with exist name

Expected.Text: b'409 Conflict: entry with name filter_rule_text_name already exists in document [contentfilterrules]'

Steps.Name: Step: User can create a filter rule with long name
Step: User can create a filter rule with special chars name
Step: User cannot create a filter rule with space char name
Step: User can create a filter rule with leading space char name
Step: User check filter rule with leading space char name
Step: User can create a filter rule with trailing space char name
Step: User check filter rule with trailing space char name
Step: User can create a filter rule with name `filter_rule_match_regex`
Step: User can create a filter rule with name `filter_rule_match_text`
Step: User cannot create a filter rule with name `filter_rule_match_empty`

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
'' is too short

Failed validating 'minLength' in schema['properties']['operand']:
    {'description': 'Matching domain(s) regex',
     'minLength': 1,
     'title': 'Operand',
     'type': 'string'}

On instance['operand']:
    ''"

Step: User can create a filter rule with empty description

Step: User can create a filter rule with special chars log message

Step: User can create a filter rule with long name category
Step: User can create a filter rule with subcategory
Step: User can create a filter rule with empty subcategory
Step: User can create a filter rule with subcategory same as category
Step: User can create a filter rule with several words subcategory
Step: User can create a filter rule with special chars subcategory
Step: User can create a filter rule with long name subcategory
Step: User can create a filter rule with risk number 1
Step: User can create a filter rule with risk number 2
Step: User can create a filter rule with risk number 3
Step: User can create a filter rule with risk number 4
Step: User can create a filter rule with risk number 5
Step: User cannot create a filter rule with several risk numbers

Expected.Text:
b"schema mismatched: 
[1, 2] is not of type 'integer'

Failed validating 'type' in schema['properties']['risk']:
    {'description': 'Risk level of this rule, between 1 (lowest risk) and '
                    '5 (highest risk)',
     'maximum': 5,
     'minimum': 1,
     'title': 'Risk Level',
     'type': 'integer'}

On instance['risk']:
    [1, 2]"
